attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i was diagnosed after i heard voices and had strange experiences leading me to believe i was the new messiah.  i was anointed by a blinding flash which was followed by 5 shooting stars AND i look like the 'BBCs christ'(SoG doc).  i heard what i refer to as angels(god)but this and my experiences did not sway psychiatrists.  i still hear voices despite being on medication for 6 years, and this makes me think that there may be many other 'psychics' who are wrongly sectioned and diagnosed 'ill'.
an identical psychosis to mine is in a Berne book(A layman's guide to psychiatry and psychoanalysis), in case you are interested.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
